item.title: Second script-mouse script
item.dc:creator: @geel9 geel9
item.description:
@geel9 wrote:

The following one does NOT hide the client, and shows info on how to stop it.

program movemouse; //////////////////////////////////////////// //created by:geel9 //to stop:press ctrl+alt+s //copyright:no-one (copies allowed, I don't care.) //thanks to:the stickied tut. I LUB YOU! procedure move; begin movemouse (689, 52) wait(500) movemouse (1007, 487) wait(500) movemouse (337, 488) wait(500) end; begin repeat move; until(false) end.

The next one hides the window and removes ALL info.

program movemouse; //////////////////////////////////////////// //created by:geel9 //copyright:no-one (copies allowed, I don't care.) //thanks to:the stickied tut. I LUB YOU! procedure move; begin movemouse (689, 52) wait(500) movemouse (1007, 487) wait(500) movemouse (337, 488) wait(500) end; begin getself.hide; repeat move; until(false) end.

Read full topic
